# Text to Speech

## API Docs

- Text to Speech [WebSocket](https://elevenlabs.io/docs/api-reference/text-to-speech/v-1-text-to-speech-voice-id-stream-input)
- Text to Speech [Multi-Context WebSocket](https://elevenlabs.io/docs/api-reference/text-to-speech/v-1-text-to-speech-voice-id-multi-stream-input)
- Text to Speech [Create speech](https://elevenlabs.io/docs/api-reference/text-to-speech/convert.mdx)
- Text to Speech [Create speech with timing](https://elevenlabs.io/docs/api-reference/text-to-speech/convert-with-timestamps.mdx)
- Text to Speech [Stream speech](https://elevenlabs.io/docs/api-reference/text-to-speech/stream.mdx)
- Text to Speech [Stream speech with timing](https://elevenlabs.io/docs/api-reference/text-to-speech/stream-with-timestamps.mdx)
